summary: This document is a suicide watch observation log for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, beginning on July 23, 2019. It records staff observations of Epstein's behavior in his cell every 15 minutes, noting he is lying on his bed and later standing at the cell door.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch log, identified by his register number and observed in his cell at MCC New York.

events.title: Suicide watch initiation for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A suicide watch was initiated for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with staff beginning 15-minute observational logs.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, on July 23, 2019.
The log documents 15-minute observations of Epstein's behavior in his cell, starting in the early morning hours.
Initial observations note Epstein lying on his bed; later entries show him standing at the cell door.
The document is a standard institutional suicide watch observation log, part of the procedures following Epstein's arrest.
